comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: forum.ixbt.com - page scrolls to top after watching uploaded image
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=8:26203:3028#3028

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Reproduction
Go to any forum topic of web forum https://forum.ixbt.com
Find a post with uploaded image, [for example](https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=8:26203:3028#3028)
Click the image to expand.
After this your web-page scrolls to the top, this is annoying, cause you have to scroll down again to find the post you read.

Disabling **AdGuard/uBO - Cookie Notices** filter solves the problem. The problem exists on both uBlock Windows Chrome Addon and AdGuard IOS/Android applications.

I was sent here by https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/20405#issuecomment-1789873325

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com/queue](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fqueue) ### Comment > i have no idea, its all on but it doesnt stop ads on spotify. it did until a few weeks ago, im sure i didnt edit anything. i tried to remove and add again the extension but still it doesnt block spotify ads. and i dont know actually about other sites, but on spotify it just doesnt work anymore. please help tell me how to fix it Username: `@,,` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> [#164590 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/164590#issuecomment-1781734622) @Divin1ty666 you should enable AdGuard Russian, also install AdGuard Extra.
> 
> This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.
> 
> If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.
> 
> If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.
> 
>     * [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
> 
>     * [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Спасибо, помогло!)
